title: This takes dedication
body:
Coincidence or OCD?

[Perfect steps of marksmen mastery levels](https://imgur.com/a/0fH6j)

Notice me senpai Rito,
LeBlob

replies.body: OMG! that's awesome!! hahaha i love it  {{champion:117}}
Downvoted as soon as I saw a level 7 mastery on vayne.
Just saying that vayne is disgustingly broken because if I have 2 Pentas with her under 30 games you know something is wrong with that champ

I had 4 on yasuo in my first week and a half of playing him only playing 1-3 games a day lol.
Edit: don’t hate me I don’t play him much anymore
You disgusted me....where's Trist,Cait and Quinn's chest????
